title: Safe driving: a question of attitude
creator_credit: Peter Dimond, South Australian Film Corporation, Max Pepper and Pepper Audio Visual
brief_description: In a series of dramatised sequences the importance of developing sensible attitudes to driving a motor vehicle is clearly presented. Aggressive and timid drivers, speeding away from traffic lights, poor driving techniques, “tailgating” and drink-driving are all dealt with.
